issue.title: gaypornhdfree.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/hot-af-nate-rose/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>[NSFW] Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/205278784-14157e69-7897-416e-8037-5e4631e9a981.png

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>



This issue is not fixed!!!!!! I still have no access to this site unless I remove adguard pro of iOS of which I am paying for by the way will someone one please help me 



Alex did not fix the issue at all!!!!!!!


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Is it always the same url? Is it getting detected when you open the video directly: https://dood.re/e/yfjo6y6y50lp10fxbtm2dre788axfux

It's weird, I go to the website I mentioned and the ads are gone, but then I click on Video and it takes you to two options for the video. When I click on either option, I do full screen and it loads and does play, but when I try to fast forward the video, it plays perfectly sometimes, but sometimes it times me out and shows the "Publisher does not allow ad blocker while viewing video" screen. Only after doing that a few times does it completely work the whole time.

issue.title: Sometimes image not loading
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![Screenshot_20221204-130810_Firefox_Beta](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44261958/205473958-8d1ff39e-b203-4eef-ad1d-9362455c7eb9.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
